Well, we have been advertising around here since August 2011, but have been going strong since 2007, making this our 5th year in business, almost entering our 6th. In that time we have built up a concise team of technicians and customer service representatives who are not only talented, but love what they do!

Our servers are located throughout the world, as we offer, and have offered such a range of services throughout our businesses lifetime. We have a lot of very happy customers, especially with our recent specialisms in Virtual Private Server hosting, with hundreds of active users on our nodes. Experiencing stable, friendly hosting.

If you have any questions, feel free to open a sales ticket - or email sales@123com.org directly. I hope you have an amazing day - and thanks for taking the time to look at 123COM!
